verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Furahini siku zote,
ombeni bila mwisho
shukuruni kwa kila jambo
maana hayo ni mapenzi
ya Mungu wetu. x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Tutubuni na kusali
tuombeni na baraka
tudumishe familia.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Unapopatwa na shida,
si mwisho wa roho yako
shukuruni na kuomba.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Matendo yenu mazuri,
yawe kitulizo kwenu
kwa kusali na kuomba.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Baraka anazo Mungu,
aombaye atapewa
shukuruni na kuomba.
